title: Psalms 107:1
text: O GIVE thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.

title: Psalms 107:2
text: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;

title: Psalms 107:3
text: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.

title: Psalms 107:4
text: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.

title: Psalms 107:5
text: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.

title: Psalms 107:6
text: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.

title: Psalms 107:7
text: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.

title: Psalms 107:8
text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

title: Psalms 107:9
text: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.

title: Psalms 107:10
text: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron;

title: Psalms 107:11
text: Because they rebelled against the words of God, and contemned the counsel of the most High:

title: Psalms 107:12
text: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour; they fell down, and there was none to help.

title: Psalms 107:13
text: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.

title: Psalms 107:14
text: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their bands in sunder.

title: Psalms 107:15
text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

title: Psalms 107:16
text: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.

title: Psalms 107:17
text: Fools because of their transgression, and because of their iniquities, are afflicted.

title: Psalms 107:18
text: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat; and they draw near unto the gates of death.

title: Psalms 107:19
text: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saveth them out of their distresses.

title: Psalms 107:20
text: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.

title: Psalms 107:21
text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

title: Psalms 107:22
text: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.

title: Psalms 107:23
text: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;

title: Psalms 107:24
text: These see the works of the LORD, and his wonders in the deep.

title: Psalms 107:25
text: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.

title: Psalms 107:26
text: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.

title: Psalms 107:27
text: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wits' end.

title: Psalms 107:28
text: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.

title: Psalms 107:29
text: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.

title: Psalms 107:30
text: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.

title: Psalms 107:31
text: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!

title: Psalms 107:32
text: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.

title: Psalms 107:33
text: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;

title: Psalms 107:34
text: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.

title: Psalms 107:35
text: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.

title: Psalms 107:36
text: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;

title: Psalms 107:37
text: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.

title: Psalms 107:38
text: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.

title: Psalms 107:39
text: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.

title: Psalms 107:40
text: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness, where there is no way.

title: Psalms 107:41
text: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh him families like a flock.

title: Psalms 107:42
text: The righteous shall see it, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.

title: Psalms 107:43
text: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.
